languages.text: "Станцию можно воздвигнуть снова. Слуги... заменимы. И лишь моя жизнь — главное для тех, кто ждет моего возвращения... И тех, кто жаждет меня убить".
"The station can be rebuilt. Servants can be... replaced. It is only my life that matters to those who await my return... and those who wish to see me dead."
languages.original_text: "Станцию можно воздвигнуть снова. Слуги... заменимы. И лишь моя жизнь — главное для тех, кто ждет моего возвращения... И тех, кто жаждет меня убить".

traits.locale_text: "The station can be rebuilt. Servants can be... replaced. It is only my life that matters to those who await my return... and those who wish to see me dead."
"The station can be rebuilt. Servants can be... replaced. It is only my life that matters to those who await my return... and those who wish to see me dead."
"The station can be rebuilt. Servants can be... replaced. It is only my life that matters to those who await my return... and those who wish to see me dead."
"The station can be rebuilt. Servants can be... replaced. It is only my life that matters to those who await my return... and those who wish to see me dead."

languages.text: “星站可以重建，仆人也可以……更换。对于那些等待我回去的人……还有那些希望我殒命的人来说……我的性命才是唯一真正重要的事情。”
languages.original_text: "The station can be rebuilt. Servants can be... replaced. It is only my life that matters to those who await my return... and those who wish to see me dead."

traits.locale_text: “星站可以重建，仆人也可以……更换。对于那些等待我回去的人……还有那些希望我殒命的人来说……我的性命才是唯一真正重要的事情。”

languages.text: « La station peut être reconstruite et les serviteurs... remplacés. Seule ma vie compte pour ceux qui attendent mon retour... comme pour ceux qui veulent ma mort. »
languages.original_text: "The station can be rebuilt. Servants can be... replaced. It is only my life that matters to those who await my return... and those who wish to see me dead."

traits.locale_text: « La station peut être reconstruite et les serviteurs... remplacés. Seule ma vie compte pour ceux qui attendent mon retour... comme pour ceux qui veulent ma mort. »

languages.text: "Die Station kann wiederaufgebaut werden. Diener können ... ersetzt werden. Nur mein Leben allein ist jenen wichtig, die auf meine Rückkehr warten ... und jenen, die mich tot sehen wollen."
languages.original_text: "The station can be rebuilt. Servants can be... replaced. It is only my life that matters to those who await my return... and those who wish to see me dead."

traits.locale_text: "Die Station kann wiederaufgebaut werden. Diener können ... ersetzt werden. Nur mein Leben allein ist jenen wichtig, die auf meine Rückkehr warten ... und jenen, die mich tot sehen wollen."

languages.text: 「ステーションは再建できます。従者は…替えがききます。私の命だけが、私の帰還を待つ者にとっては問題なのです…私の死を待ち望む者にとっても」
languages.original_text: "The station can be rebuilt. Servants can be... replaced. It is only my life that matters to those who await my return... and those who wish to see me dead."

traits.locale_text: 「ステーションは再建できます。従者は…替えがききます。私の命だけが、私の帰還を待つ者にとっては問題なのです…私の死を待ち望む者にとっても」

languages.text: «La estación se puede reconstruir. Los sirvientes se pueden... reemplazar. Mi vida es la única que importa para quienes esperan mi regreso... y para quienes solo quieren verme muerta».
languages.original_text: "The station can be rebuilt. Servants can be... replaced. It is only my life that matters to those who await my return... and those who wish to see me dead."

traits.locale_text: «La estación se puede reconstruir. Los sirvientes se pueden... reemplazar. Mi vida es la única que importa para quienes esperan mi regreso... y para quienes solo quieren verme muerta».

languages.original_text: "The station can be rebuilt. Servants can be... replaced. It is only my life that matters to those who await my return... and those who wish to see me dead."

languages.text: "İstasyon yeniden inşa edilebilir. Hizmetkârların yenileri gelir. Yolumu gözleyenler ile öldüğümü görmeyi arzu edenler için önem arz eden tek şey, canımdır."
languages.original_text: "The station can be rebuilt. Servants can be... replaced. It is only my life that matters to those who await my return... and those who wish to see me dead."

traits.locale_text: "İstasyon yeniden inşa edilebilir. Hizmetkârların yenileri gelir. Yolumu gözleyenler ile öldüğümü görmeyi arzu edenler için önem arz eden tek şey, canımdır."
